data.title: Angel Lucy's Funeral Home Memorials and Obituaries
data.meta_description: Search & Browse Memorials and Obituaries from Angel Lucy's Funeral Home on We Remember.
data.text:
Brownsville,Texas

Anicacia G. Lopez

Anicacia G. Lopez 92 years of age from Los Fresnos, Texas entered into her eternal rest on Friday June 10, 2022 in Brownsville, Texas surrounded by her loving family. Anicacia was born in Mason, Texas to Phillip and Siberia Gonzales on December 14, 1929. Anicacia is preceded in death by her parents, Phillip and Siberia Gonzales and her loving husband, Adan Lopez Sr. Left behind to cherish her loving memory is her children, Adan (Maria Elena) Lopez Jr., Roy (Elvia) Lopez, Mary Lou Rivera, Rosie (Andy) Caballero, Ted (Terry) Lopez; 16 grandchildren, 29 great- grandchildren, and 5 great-great grandchildren. Visitation will begin Tuesday June 14, 2022 from 1:00 pm - 8:00 pm with the...

Los Fresnos

William Louis Kuntz

William Louis Kuntz 87, went to be with the Lord on Monday, January 24, 2022. William was born in Decatur, Illinois on February 18, 1934 to Harold "Harry" Kuntz and Betty Kuntz. William received his Bachelor's from Millikin University in Decatur, IL, served as a Specialist 5 in the United States Army and retired as a Food Service Manager. He attended and served at First Baptist Church of Los Fresnos. William had a love for gardening and enjoyed watching Westerns & War stories and reading. William was preceded in death by his mother & father, and sister Helen Young. He is survived by his wife Louise M. Kuntz as well by his children: Dave (Trina), Michael (Myriam), Eric (Debbie),...

Los Fresnos

Francisco Solis Garcia Jr

Francisco Solis Garcia Jr, age 72, went home to be with Jehovah on January 19th, 2022 at his residence in Los Fresnos, Texas. Frank, or his preferred nickname of Pancho, enjoyed a full life. Pancho was born on November 24, 1949 in Brownsville, Texas to Francisco Solis Garcia and Gloria Gould Garcia. Pancho is preceded in death by his parents and an older sister in infancy. Born in Brownsville, Texas, he grew up in Scarborough, Maine and Groton, Connecticut where he acquired his love for the sea and began his studies of the Bible. Early in life, Pancho attended catechism and religious classes as a Roman Catholic, becoming an alter boy. Pancho graduated from Fitch Senior High School in...

Rancho Viejo

David Rivera Elizondo

David Rivera Elizondo 81 years of age went home to be with Lord on November 22, 2021 at home in Rancho Viejo, Texas. David was born on May 16, 1940 in Brownsville, Texas to Domingo Elizondo and Lorenza Rivera. David is preceded in death by Domingo Elizondo, Lorenza Rivera Lopez, Matias Lopez, Tomas Lopez, and Cayetano Lopez. Mr. Elizondo retired as an Assistant General Manger for the Brownsville Public Utilities Board after 37 years of service, in which that time he held several licenses and certifications. He was a member of Iglesia Principe de Paz where he was the President of the Board. David enjoyed fishing, billiards, and spending time with his family. Left behind to cherish his...
